app.title: EPCalculator v2 - Xato ehtimoli kalkulyatori
app.tagline: Raqamli uzatish tizimlari uchun xato ehtimoli kalkulyatori

params.title: Simulyatsiya parametrlari
params.customConstellationHelp: Maxsus ehtimollar bilan o'zingizning burj nuqtalarini belgilang

results.title: Simulyatsiya natijalari
results.computingHint: Parametrlarga qarab, bu biroz vaqt talab qilishi mumkin
results.errorProbabilityDesc: Uzatilgan belgi noto'g'ri qabul qilinish ehtimoli
results.errorExponentDesc: Kod uzunligiga bog'liq xato ehtimolining eksponensial kamayish tezligi
results.optimalRhoDesc: Optimallashtirish jarayonidan olingan optimal parametr qiymati
results.noResultsHint: Simulyatsiya parametrlarini sozlang va natijalarni ko'rish uchun "Xato ehtimolini hisoblash" tugmasini bosing.
results.optimizationValue: Moslashuvchan qadam o'lchami bilan gradient tushirish

simulation.title: Xato ehtimoli simulyatsiyasi
simulation.description: Modulyatsiya parametrlarini sozlang va axborot-nazariy tahlil orqali xato ehtimoli chegaralarini hisoblang.

plottingPanel.title: Interaktiv grafiklar
plottingPanel.description: Turli parametr diapazonlarida xato ehtimoli xatti-harakatlarini vizualizatsiya qilish uchun interaktiv grafiklar yarating.
plottingPanel.generatingHint: Ma'lumot nuqtalari hisoblanmoqda va vizualizatsiya chizilmoqda
plottingPanel.noPlotsHint: Grafik parametrlari va simulyatsiya parametrlarini sozlang, so'ngra vizualizatsiya yaratish uchun "Grafik yaratish" tugmasini bosing.

plotting.title: Grafik Boshqaruvlari
plotting.mbNotAvailable: MB mavjud emas, agar β X o'qida bo'lsa
plotting.mbDescription: Maksvell-Bolsman taqsimoti: Q(x) ∝ exp(-β|x|²). Yuqori β qiymatlari past energiyali belgilarga ehtimolni to'playdi (ehtimoliy amplituda shakllantirish).
plotting.affectsDistribution: Nuqta taqsimoti va diapazon birliklariga ta'sir qiladi
plotting.fixErrors: Grafik chizishdan oldin yuqoridagi xatolarni tuzating.
plotting.importHelp: Python, MATLAB, Excel va h.k.dan yuklash, qo'lda kiritish yoki joylashtirish
plotting.mergeOrNewDescription: Bir xil o'qlarga ega grafik allaqachon mavjud. Yangi ma'lumotlarni birlashtirmoqchimisiz yoki alohida rasm yaratmoqchimisiz?

constellation.title: Maxsus yulduz turkumi
constellation.description: Aniq nuqta koordinatalari va ehtimollar bilan o'z yulduz turkumingizni aniqlang.
constellation.textFormatHint: Format: har bir qator uchun x,y yoki vaznli uchun x,y,p
constellation.parseError: Matnni tahlil qilish muvaffaqiyatsiz. Format ishlating: x,y yoki x,y,p har bir qator uchun

dataImport.title: Ma'lumotlarni import qilish
dataImport.dragDrop: Faylni bu yerga sudrab qo'ying yoki tanlash uchun bosing

validation.modulationPowerOf2: Modulyatsiya 2 dan 512 gacha 2 ning darajasi bo'lishi kerak
validation.qamPerfectSquare: QAM uchun M to'liq kvadrat bo'lishi kerak (4, 16, 64, 256)
validation.customConstellationInvalid: Maxsus burj yaroqsiz (ehtimollar yig'indisi va energiyani tekshiring)
validation.codeLengthRange: Kod uzunligi 1 va 1000000 oralig'ida bo'lishi kerak
validation.xRangeInvalid: X diapazoni ikkita qiymatga ega bo'lishi kerak, bu yerda min < maks
validation.x2RangeInvalid: X2 diapazoni ikkita qiymatga ega bo'lishi kerak, bu yerda min < maks
validation.x2PointsRange: X2 nuqtalari 1 va 101 oralig'ida bo'lishi kerak

footer.title: EPCalculator v2
footer.description: Raqamli uzatish tizimlari uchun xato ehtimolini hisoblashning zamonaviy amalga oshirilishi.

tutorial.welcomeSubtitle: Error Probability Calculator for Digital Communications
tutorial.singlePointDesc: Compute error probability for specific parameter values. Set modulation, SNR, and code rate to get instant results.
tutorial.plottingDesc: Generate interactive plots to explore how error probability changes across parameter ranges. Compare different configurations visually.
tutorial.pressEscHint: Press Enter or Esc to continue
tutorial.stepAxisScalesDesc: Each axis can be Linear or Logarithmic. For SNR axes, toggle between dB and linear units. The button shows the state it will switch to when clicked.
tutorial.stepTransposeDesc: Swap the X and Y axes to view the data from a different perspective.
tutorial.stepExportDesc: Export your plot as PNG, SVG for images, or CSV for raw data analysis.
tutorial.stepRemoveDesc: Remove this plot from your workspace. You can always generate it again.
tutorial.stepContourComparisonDesc: Select multiple contour plots using the checkboxes to compare them. Use Comparison to show differences between two plots, or Benchmark to overlay multiple 3D surfaces.
tutorial.stepConstellationDesc: Drag points to move them. Hover to see coordinates.
tutorial.stepConstellationTableDesc: Edit point coordinates and probabilities precisely.
tutorial.stepConstellationLuckyDesc: Generate a random constellation with 2-16 points. The constellation is automatically normalized to have unit energy and probabilities summing to 1.
tutorial.stepConstellationHideTableDesc: Show or hide the points table to focus on the visual editor or get more precise control over point values.
